string-array.name: advanced_one
string-array.item: If#And#But#Or#____ the shoe fits, wear it.
have to #would#will#shall#To lose weight, you ______ eat less or exercise more.
gets#gotten #was#be#The bathroom never ______ cleaned if I don\'t do it myself.
had known #had known #would have known #known#If she _________ about his financial situation, she would have helped him out.
looking after #looking into #looking at #looking onto#I\'ll be ______ their cat while they are away on holiday.
do#to do#doing#is doing#He made his children _____ their homework every afternoon.
so#such#as#to#The test was _____ difficult she had problems finishing it on time.
will have finished #finish#will finish #finished#By the time she arrives, we _________ our homework.
to stick #poking#plunging#puncturing#Marzia expected the doctor ______ a needle in her arm.

That\'s amazing. Does it also get Spanish radio? #When? #That\'s amazing. Will it gets Spanish stations too? #My radio is the better. It gets stations from China. #Choose the CORRECT RESPONSE: My radio will even get stations from Russia. ______

He usually can cook something to eat and then go to bed by ten thirty. #Can you give me that black book please? #You can take your stupid ideas and get out! #You can hang your coat in that closet. #Which is NOT CORRECT?
They never shrink. #Problem with bureacracies is that they just grow and grow. #Who ever heard of a government who lowered taxes? #And any government does get more efficient? #Which is CORRECT?

The policeman says I may pay a fine because I was driving too fast. #You really ought to call your wife. She must be worried. #Let\'s leave at seven. The traffic ought to be better by then. #The snow ought to be completely gone by April. #Which is NOT CORRECT?
The chair is being sat in. #In a chair is sitting by her. #It\'s being sat in by she. #It is sat in by her. #CHANGE TO PASSIVE; which is correct? She is sitting in a chair.

He said the movie was too long. #He telled me not to waste my time there. #He asked me where could he buy some shoes. #He said he liked house with big windows. #Choose the CORRECT RESPONSE: What did Mr. Schmitt say? ______
You can\'t make an omelette without breaking eggs. #What goes up must come down? #Can\'t make something out of nothing. #Where is there smoke there\'s fire. #Which is CORRECT?
against#instead#than#beyond#Using your cell phone while driving is _______ the law.
at#in#what#that#I have no experience, so I\'m _____ a disadvantage when it comes to this job interview.
isn\'t it #aren\'t it # doesn\'t it # won\'t it #Chicago is a large city, _____?
catch on fire # catch to fire#catch the fire# catch with fire# Don\'t leave your books near the open fire. They might easily _____.
swimming#to swim #swim# to swimming #Do you enjoy _____?
blew#blow#blown#blowed#The wind ______ hard all night.
was#were#been#being# CHANGE this verb TO PAST TENSE: is
fought#fighted#fighed#fought#CHANGE this verb TO PAST TENSE: fight
got#gotten#gat#get#CHANGE this verb TO PAST TENSE: get
because#but#except#during#We get good grades ______ we study.
awake#weike#spleeping#unconscious#Which is the OPPOSITE? asleep
ought to#should to#can#would# After all this rain, tomorrow ______ be sunny.
into#to#onto#inside#The Olympic champion dove ______ the swimming pool from ten meters high.

string-array.name: advanced_two
string-array.item: must have #had#have #had to #After working all day, you ______ been tired.
gets#gotten#was#be #The bathroom never ______ cleaned if I don\'t do it myself.
can#would#are able to #will#To get to Brooklyn from Manhattan, you ______ take the A-Train.
Peter, will you eat some spinach? #Shall you be thirty this year? #Will you go Home after work? #Where will you be next week? #Choose the CORRECT QUESTION: ______ No, I won\'t.

He usually can cook something to eat and then go to bed by ten thirty. #Can you give me that black book please? #You can take your stupid ideas and get out! #You can hang your coat in that closet. #Which is NOT CORRECT?
They never shrink. #Problem with bureacracies is that they just grow and grow. #Who ever heard of a government who lowered taxes? #And any government does get more efficient? #Which is CORRECT?
The yogurt is eaten by the boy. #Is eaten, the yogurt. #He is eating the yogurt. #It\'s eaten of him. #CHANGE TO PASSIVE; which is correct? The boy eats yogurt.
The story is being explained by her. #It\'s being exlplained by she. #Is the story being explained. #The story is explaining by her. #CHANGE TO PASSIVE; which is correct? She is explaining the story.
Try the soup, you might to like it. #We could hear from him soon. #I might do it, if I feel like it. #Maybe the pizzeria is closed. #Which is NOT CORRECT?
was going to wear #going to put on #putting on #about to put on #She ______ a black dress but she changed her mind.
had finished #finished#was finished #had been finished#She ______ lunch by the time we arrived.
set#setted#sat#sets#The sun ______ at 9 last night.
to speak #speaking#speak#spoken#When I stopped _______ to Mary, she was picking some flowers in her garden.
studying #he studied #studied#is studying#Despite _______ hard, he failed the exam.
is being used #is used #uses#use#That room ______ for a meeting this afternoon.
could#shall#will#would#You look very tired; you ______ take a shower and freshen up if you like.
by#of#via#for#I read a great book ______ John Grisham.
for#over#since#ever#My grandparents lived in that same house _____ ages.
remembering my password #remember my password # to remembering my password #to remember my password #I have trouble _____.
much work #many work#many works# much works#Do you have _____ to do today? We could have a long lunch if not.
put us up #put us in# provide us up #provide us in #My brother will _____ for a few nights.
Why#When#Where#Who#____ are you mad? Because you are late!
get off#get over#get on#get down#We must ______ the train at the next stop.
wait#avoid#like#attempt#I\'m sorry, you will just have to ______.
Yes, I do.#I always brushing my teeth.#I twice a day brush my teeth.#Yes, I brush the teeth after every meal.#Do you brush your teeth after every meal? ______
There are millions and millions.#There are much fish in the sea.#There are many fishes in the sea.#Are there millions of fish in the sea.#How many fish are there in the sea? ______
Yes, there is.#Yes, is there.#No, isn\'t.#No, they isn\'t.#Is there a doctor in the house? ____
I wasn\'t in town.#I was with he and she.#I wasn\'t to the office.#I was at the home.#Where were you yesterday? ______

string-array.name: advanced_three
string-array.item: Well, it sure won\'t fix itself! #Get Mary do it. #I\'ll have the plumber to do it. #It will gets fixed; don\'t worry. #Choose the CORRECT RESPONSE: Who\'s going to fix the kitchen sink? ______

we may have to hire a boat to take us out to the islands. #we be eating in restaurants every night. #you\'ll able to buy sandals like mine. #we\'ll already has used up half our vacation. #When we get to Thailand, ______
to get #to cause #have#get#This summer, we\'re going ______ the house painted.
could\'ve #could#might#would have #If you wanted to use my bicycle you ______ asked.

A woodchuck could chuck much. #A woodchuck could chuck many wood. #He would have chucked until he up-chucked. #It will chuck a lot. #How much wood could a woodchuck chuck, if a woodchuck could chuck wood? ______
Peter, will you eat some spinach? #Shall you be thirty this year? #Will you go Home after work? #Will you go to party at Deborah\'s house? #Choose the CORRECT QUESTION: ______ No, I won\'t.
comes a little earlier? #your company salesman #Ten o\'clock #would be good. #Where is the ERROR? Could your company salesman comes a little earlier? Ten o\'clock would be good.
The rocks were beaten upon by the waves. #They was beaten upon. #The waves were beating upon them. #The rocks were beated upon. #CHANGE TO PASSIVE; which is correct? The waves beat upon the rocks.
If you can\'t beat \'em, join \'em. #If you didn\'t know, why you said that? #If I were rich, I\'ll open a business. #If at first you don\'t succeed, to try, to try again. #Which is CORRECT?

They were going to, but there wasn\'t enough time. #The Sanchezs was going to come but then they cancelled. #They tried, but the Sanchezs had left on vacation yet. #They wanted to but none answered when they called. #Choose the CORRECT RESPONSE: Why didn\'t they invite us to the Sanchezs? ______
would#used#would to #would have#We _______ play tennis every day when we were young.
were#was#are#am# If I _______ you, I would get a better job.
arrives#will arrive #is going to arrive #have arrived# He\'ll give you a call as soon as he _______.
Neither did I. #So did I. #Neither I did. #I didn\'t#He really didn\'t want to come last night. ____
he wants #does he want #wants he #for he want#Do you think he knows what _____?
himself#even#too#really #Guess who I saw at the restaurant Arnold Schwarzenegger ______!
by#to#until#for#Where\'s Roberta? She should have gotten here ______ now.
although#besides#in spite of #at before#______ she\'s a little shy, she\'s a wonderful person once you get to know her.
take place # hold on #hold place # take on #When will the meeting _____?
on Tuesday #with Tuesday # in Tuesday #at Tuesday #The board meeting was held _____.
go to the house party with #go together the house party with #go the house party with #together the house party with #Why don\'t you _____ us?
I\'ll get#I\'m getting#I get#I\'d get#I haven\'t got any money. Never mind. ---- some from the bank
in#at#to#on#I stay at home ---- the morning.
there are many on#are some on#are there many on#there are some to#Are there any good restaurants around here? Yes, ______ the highway.
I\'m the secretary.#I are a secretary.#I am my employee.#he is the president of them.#Are you the president of this company? No, ___
were they#you are been#are been#was#How long ______ in Spain on vacation last summer?
Before#To#From#While#___ the war, most Italians were farmers.
While#Through#During#By#___ my wife sleeps, I watch TV late at night.

string-array.name: advanced_four
string-array.item: did you already know the author? #did you know it was wrote by Thomas Kuhn? #did you already see the movie? #had already you read that author\'s other books? #When you bought the book, ______
had to #must have #must#had got to #Our car broke down so we ______ walk.
didn\'t have to #mustn\'t have #hadn\'t#hadn\'t got to #When I was in school, we ______ study Ancient Latin.
must have #could #should have #must#It ______ rained because the roads are wet.
get#make#has#to have #We must ______ the roof fixed before it rains.
to get #to cause #have#get#This summer, we\'re going ______ the house painted.
might have #will#could #should#If Ms. Suwan knew she was going to be late, she ______ called me.
Will I get you a drink? #Will you go with me to the movies? #Don\'t give Daniel any meat; he won\'t eat it. #That tall woman with straight black hair will be Anna. #Which is NOT CORRECT?
Would #May#Must#Shall#______ you open the window please? Certainly.
Mario usually must drink coffee in the morning. #You\'ve got to buy your tickets before you go into the theater. #You\'ve got to be joking! #You must be crazy! #Which is NOT CORRECT?
as ___ as #as ___ than #as ___ so #than__so#I think San Francisco is ______ exciting _____ New York.
have been working #have worked #worked#am working#Why are your hands so dirty? - Well, I ____ in the garden.
to lock #locking#lock#to locking#Did you remember ______ the door?
Which model goes #Which model does go #Which does model go #Which does model goes to#______ 250 k.p.h.?
whose#who#that#which#That is the man ____ grandfather founded Kentucky Root Beer.

two hundred and twenty two twenty two thousand two hundred and twenty seconds #two twenty two over twenty two two twenty two #two two two divided by two two two two two #two hundred twenty two twenty two thousand two hundred twenty seconds # How do you say this USING WORDS? 222/22,222
along#onto#through#at#We drove ____ the coastline of California.
since#though#until#at since#You can take 6 people to the airport _________ you have a minivan.
three weeks ago#three weeks past #before three weeks#three weeks before#That awful accident occurred _____.
agree with # agree to #agree#agree about #They didn\'t _____ John when he explained his decision.
called on #called to the house of #called on the house of #called to # The social worker _____ the two old sisters who were ill.
much#many#enough#more#I have too ____ homework to do.
in#at#on#to#The sun rises ____ the east.
have#has#is#are#The jeans ____ three pockets
there are many on#are some on#are there many on#there are some to#Are there any good restaurants around here? Yes, ______ the highway.
is worse.#worse is.#is worst.#is badder.#English grammar is the worst grammar of any language. No, it isn\'t. German grammar ______
My sister writes books.#She work in a factory.#She teaches to children English.#Works at the school.#What does your sister do? ____
The#An#These#Many#___ city museum is closed today.

string-array.name: advanced_five
string-array.item: I haven\'t eaten #I ate #Did I not eat #Have I not eaten #I\'m hungry. ______ anything today.
The story is being explained by her. #It\'s being exlplained by she. #Is the story being explained. #The story is explaining by her. #CHANGE TO PASSIVE; which is correct? She is explaining the story.

The microphone was being held up to his mouth by the interviewer. #The microphone was being holden up to his mouth. #The microphone up to his mouth was being held. #The interviewer was, up to his mouth, holding the microphone. #CHANGE TO PASSIVE; which is correct? The interviewer was holding the microphone up to his mouth.
Well, it sure won\'t fix itself! #Get Mary do it. #I\'ll have the plumber to do it. #It will gets fixed; don\'t worry. #Choose the CORRECT RESPONSE: Who\'s going to fix the kitchen sink? ______
had to #must have #had got to #necessary#Our car broke down so we ______ walk.
had#must have #have#had to #After working all day, you ______ been tired.
had to #should#have#must have #When we got to the border, we ______ show our passports.
might#is able to #will#shall#If Karl is interested in becoming a pilot, he ______ talk to Mr. Malinowski who was in the air force.
could\'ve#could#might#would have #If you wanted to use my bicycle you ______ asked.

I don\'t know, but I think it\'s on a weekend. #Halloween is on the Wednesday this year. #I think it\'s of a Friday. #Halloween\'s on 31 October. #Choose the CORRECT RESPONSE: What day is Halloween this year? ______
make out#see out#make through#see through#I could hardly _______ the ship in the distance.
\'s going to #will#shall#must#Look at those clouds! It ______ rain.
Unless he comes #If not he comes #Since he comes #for he comes#________, we won\'t have much to talk about.
no#any#not any#not for#He has _____ interest in continuing the project.
must have been #must be#must go#must has been#Where do you think Jane was yesterday? - She ______ at home.
The clean dishes are on the shelves, inside the cupboard. #There are dirty dish in the sink. #Is boiling water in a pot on the stove. #Behind the refrigerator, there is many dust. #Which is CORRECT?
by#on#through#though#The scientist made an amazing discovery _____ accident.
than#besides#instead#on#I\'d rather be single ________ in a bad relationship.
celebrate#praise#honor#congratulate#Tomorrow is Paul\'s birthday. Let\'s _____ it.
to ask a question #to asking a question #ask a question #asking a question # If you don\'t understand the text, don\'t hesitate _____.
go skiing # go ski #skiing #go to ski #It\'s snowing. Would you like to _____ on Saturday or Sunday?
On the table#Because it\'s lost#No, you didn\'t#it;s mine#Where is my pen?
I visited Judy#I visit my mother#Yes, I did#Yes, I do#Who did you visit?
Did you watch#Watched you#Watchen#You watched#____ the football game last night? No, last night we went out to dinner.
was#were#will#where#George Washington ______ the first President of the United States.
What type of fruit do#What kind of fruit#How many fruit do#Types of fruit do#____ you like? I like grapes and figs.
Where are you going?#Why are you going?#What are you going?#Where you going?#Choose the CORRECT QUESTION: ______? I\'m going to work
how#where#when#why#Hello, ______ are you? I\'m fine thanks, and you?

string-array.name: advanced_six
string-array.item: Why don\'t you come with us to the disco? #You will come to our house? #What will you do? #To come with us to the Thompsons\' house. # Choose the CORRECT QUESTION: ____? Okay, I\'ll follow your car.

Your mother said you might go to bed at nine o\'clock and not a minute later! #I see that your television has bad reception; might I take a shot at fixing it? #He may have a college degree but he\'s a lousy poker-player. #Bring some identification because they might ask for it. #Which is NOT CORRECT?

If you like spicy food, you will try a Mexican restaurant. #Your son lives in a large American city on a lake? Ah! that will be Chicago. #My old car will barely go eighty kilometers per hour. #You just sit right there. I\'ll answer the phone. #Which is NOT CORRECT?

The chair is being sat in. #In a chair is sitting by her. #It\'s being sat in by she. #It is sat in by her. #CHANGE TO PASSIVE; which is correct? She is sitting in a chair.
Time is money. #Takes money to make money. #Money doesn\'t grow of trees. #Put your money where is your mouth. #Which is CORRECT?
Well, it sure won\'t fix itself! #Get Mary do it. #I\'ll have the plumber to do it. #It will gets fixed; don\'t worry. #Choose the CORRECT RESPONSE: Who\'s going to fix the kitchen sink? ______
had to #must have #must#had got to #Our car broke down so we ______ walk.
was going to #is going to #will#not#Jack told me he ________ come the next day.
out of#out#into#onto#He drove the car _______ the garage and left for work.
came into#came along#came through#came for#Jack __________ a fortune when his great uncle passed on.
few#a few#a lot#lot#Unfortunately, Peter has ______ friends in Tacoma.
would#were#will#was#\'I will finish that project soon.\' - Ken said he ________ finish that project soon.
During#While#For#For that#______ the last market session the Dow Jones dropped 67 points.
within#during#inside#beside#After payment, you\'ll receive the product ________ 10 business days.
under#in#with#within#He\'s Italian? For some reason I was _______ the impression that he was Spanish.
much money #much funds # many funds # many money # Our company didn\'t pay _____ for that banner advertisement.
swimming# to swim #swim#to go swimming # Do you feel like _____ now?
introduced to # introduced #introduced at # introduced with # Tom was thrilled to be _____ such a beautiful and interesting lady.
wanted#went#spoke#died#He ______ all of them.
My place#It is yours#Yes, we shall#Not you#Shall we go to your place or mine?
At 7 PM#No, she won\'t#From France#In India#When will Lucy arrive?
It was Ryan#It\'s midnight#Yes, I called#I will#Who called here so late?
No, I don\'t# At the cinema#Yes, I watched it#Nothing#Do you want to watch a movie?
and#because#except#while#She cannot talk ______ walk at the same time.
when#but#and#while#You can have ice cream ______ you finish your dinner.

string-array.item: did you already know the author? #did you know it was wrote by Thomas Kuhn? #did you already see the movie? #did you still reading his first book? #When you bought the book, ______

I don\'t know, but I think it\'s on a weekend. #Halloween is on the Wednesday this year. #I think it\'s of a Friday. #Halloween\'s on 31 October. #Choose the CORRECT RESPONSE: What day is Halloween this year? ______

and Jill came tumbling after. #Jack and Jill gone up the hill #for to fetch a pail of water. #Jack down fell, #Which is CORRECT?
The story is being explained by her. #It\'s being exlplained by she. #Is the story being explained. #The story is explaining by her. #CHANGE TO PASSIVE; which is correct? She is explaining the story.
Try the soup, you might to like it. #We could hear from him soon. #I might do it, if I feel like it. #It may rain tonight. #Which is NOT CORRECT?
You can\'t make an omelette without breaking eggs. #What goes up must come down? #Can\'t make something out of nothing. #Where is there smoke there\'s fire. #Which is CORRECT?
was going to wear #going to put on #putting on #about to put on #She ______ a black dress but she changed her mind.
must have #could #should have #must #It ______ rained because the roads are wet.
get#make#to have #has#We must ______ the roof fixed before it rains.
as#like#so#for#In his position _____ managing director, he is responsible for more than 300 employees.
had bought #bought#would buy #had buyed#She wished she _______ the new car.
have been made #have been making #have made #has been making#Fiestas _________ in Cologne, Germany for many years now.
won\'t you #aren\'t you #will you #are you#You\'ll be leaving for Tokyo soon, _______?
into#inside#whitin#beside#We\'ve put a lot of effort ______ this project.
per#for#by#in#His consulting fee is $150 ______ hour.
except#against#without#somethimes#Everyone __________ Joanna agreed with me.
graduate from #graduate# graduating # graduating from #What year did you _____ university?
consult#consult to #consult for # consult by # It seems to be getting worse. You had better _____ a specialist.
went#goes#has gone#go#He _______ to Chicago with his brother four days ago.
is#are#were#be#Some of this book _______ not very interesting.
goes#go#gos#gose#The average American ________ to the dentist once a year.
the#a#an#that#He is one of ___ smartest people I know.
(Nothing)#The#A#An#___ milk is good for you.
(Nothing)#the#a#some#I can\'t believe I failed ___ yesterday\'s test!
a#the#an#those#Do you have ___ dictionary that I can borrow?
get up# got up#gets up#has gotten up#They go to school together in the morning, and always ______ at the same time.
